name: digital-greenhouse
description: Cameron Potter's Interactive Digital Greenhouse - A living, breathing personal site

scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.test: concurrently "cd frontend && npm test" "cd backend && pytest"
scripts.lint: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run lint" "cd backend && ruff check ."
scripts.format: concurrently "cd frontend && npm run format" "cd backend && ruff format ."
